title: Outcomes-Based Language Education Design Workshop for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Healthcare Terminology and Job-Related Language Expressions
context.additional_context: Emphasizes immediately applicable language skills in medical settings, operating with a focus on real-time interaction and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can use specialized terminology required for patient record documentation with 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully conduct dialogues in role-playing scenarios three or more times by applying standard communication protocols during medical consultations.
Learners can write self-reflection reports according to outcome-based assessment criteria and develop improvement plans incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
